headline: This is Why  Ventas (VTR) is a Great Dividend Stock
summary: Dividends are one of the best benefits to being a shareholder, but finding a great dividend stock is no easy task. Does Ventas (VTR) have what it takes? Let's find out.

headline: Why Ventas Is Poised For Strong Long-Term Returns
summary: Ventas is a well-run REIT that's experiencing high growth, particularly in its SHOP portfolio. Check out why I remain bullish on VTR stock.
